memberdef.argsstring: (UsdPrim const &prim, SdfPath const &cachePath, HdDirtyBits *timeVaryingBits, UsdImagingInstancerContext const *instancerContext=NULL) const override
memberdef.name: TrackVariability

briefdescription.para: For the given prim, variability is detected and stored in timeVaryingBits.

detaileddescription.para: Initial values are cached into the value cache.
This method is expected to be called from multiple threads.

memberdef.argsstring: (UsdPrim const &prim, SdfPath const &cachePath, UsdTimeCode time, HdDirtyBits requestedBits, UsdImagingInstancerContext const *instancerContext=NULL) const override
memberdef.name: UpdateForTime

briefdescription.para: Populates the cache for the given prim, time and requestedBits.

detaileddescription.para: This method is expected to be called from multiple threads.

memberdef.argsstring: (UsdPrim const &prim, SdfPath const &cachePath, TfToken const &property) override
memberdef.name: ProcessPropertyChange

briefdescription.para: Returns a bit mask of attributes to be updated, or HdChangeTracker::AllDirty if the entire prim must be resynchronized.
When a PrimResync event occurs, the prim may have been deleted entirely, adapter plug-ins should override this method to free any per-prim state that was accumulated in the adapter.
Removes all associated Rprims and dependencies from the render index without scheduling them for repopulation.

memberdef.argsstring: (UsdPrim const &prim, SdfPath const &cachePath, HdDirtyBits dirty, UsdImagingIndexProxy *index) override
memberdef.name: MarkDirty

memberdef.argsstring: (UsdPrim const &prim, SdfPath const &cachePath, TfToken const &key, UsdTimeCode time, VtIntArray *outIndices) const override
memberdef.name: Get

briefdescription.para: Gets the value of the parameter named key for the given prim (which has the given cache path) and given time.

detaileddescription.para: If outIndices is not nullptr and the value has indices, it will return the unflattened value and set outIndices to the value's associated indices.

memberdef.argsstring: (UsdPrim const &prim, SdfPath const &cachePath, UsdTimeCode time) const override
memberdef.name: GetCullStyle

briefdescription.para: Gets the cullstyle of a specific path in the scene graph.

memberdef.argsstring: (UsdPrim const &prim, SdfPath const &cachePath, UsdTimeCode time) const override
memberdef.name: GetTopology

briefdescription.para: Gets the topology object of a specific Usd prim.

detaileddescription.para: If the adapter is a mesh it will return an HdMeshTopology, if it is of type basis curves, it will return an HdBasisCurvesTopology. If the adapter does not have a topology, it returns an empty VtValue.

memberdef.argsstring: (UsdPrim const &prim, SdfPath const &cachePath, UsdTimeCode time) const override
memberdef.name: GetExtent

briefdescription.para: Reads the extent from the given prim.

detaileddescription.para: If the extent is not authored, an empty GfRange3d is returned, the extent will not be computed.

memberdef.argsstring: (UsdPrim const &prim, SdfPath const &cachePath, UsdTimeCode time) const override
memberdef.name: GetDoubleSided

briefdescription.para: Reads double-sided from the given prim. If not authored, returns false.

memberdef.argsstring: (UsdPrim const &prim, SdfPath const &cachePath, UsdTimeCode time, bool ignoreRootTransform=false) const override
memberdef.name: GetTransform

briefdescription.para: Fetches the transform for the given prim at the given time from a pre-computed cache of prim transforms.

detaileddescription.para: Requesting transforms at incoherent times is currently inefficient.

memberdef.argsstring: (UsdPrim const &prim, SdfPath const &cachePath, UsdTimeCode time) const override
memberdef.name: GetMaterialId

memberdef.argsstring: (UsdPrim const &prim, SdfPath const &cachePath, UsdTimeCode time) const override

briefdescription.para: Called to populate the RenderIndex for this UsdPrim.

detaileddescription.para: The adapter is expected to create one or more Rprims in the render index using the given proxy.

briefdescription.para: Returns true if the adapter can be populated into the target index.
Delegate support for the drawMode attribute on UsdGeomModelAPI.
